languages.text: "Ловушка на замерзшем мире — жестокий силок для ничего не подозревающих жертв. Невинные, привлеченные сигналом, расплачивались за свое милосердие гибелью".
"A trap on a frozen world — a cruel snare for unsuspecting victims. The innocent souls drawn in by the signal paid for their kindness with their lives."
languages.original_text: "Ловушка на замерзшем мире — жестокий силок для ничего не подозревающих жертв. Невинные, привлеченные сигналом, расплачивались за свое милосердие гибелью".

traits.locale_text: "A trap on a frozen world — a cruel snare for unsuspecting victims. The innocent souls drawn in by the signal paid for their kindness with their lives."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A trap on a frozen world — a cruel snare for unsuspecting victims. The innocent souls drawn in by the signal paid for their kindness with their lives."

languages.text: “冰封世界中的陷阱，那个残酷的圈套专门用来诱骗天真的受害者。那些被这个信号吸引至此的无辜灵魂，将会为他们的善良付出生命的代价。”
languages.original_text: "A trap on a frozen world — a cruel snare for unsuspecting victims. The innocent souls drawn in by the signal paid for their kindness with their lives."

traits.locale_text: “冰封世界中的陷阱，那个残酷的圈套专门用来诱骗天真的受害者。那些被这个信号吸引至此的无辜灵魂，将会为他们的善良付出生命的代价。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Un piège sur un monde gelé... Une ruse bien cruelle pour attirer des victimes innocentes qui finissent par payer leurs bonnes intentions de leur vie. »
languages.original_text: "A trap on a frozen world — a cruel snare for unsuspecting victims. The innocent souls drawn in by the signal paid for their kindness with their lives."

traits.locale_text: « Un piège sur un monde gelé... Une ruse bien cruelle pour attirer des victimes innocentes qui finissent par payer leurs bonnes intentions de leur vie. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Una trampa en un mundo helado... una celda cruel para víctimas vulnerables. Las almas inocentes atraídas por la señal pagaron por su amabilidad con sus vidas».
languages.original_text: "A trap on a frozen world — a cruel snare for unsuspecting victims. The innocent souls drawn in by the signal paid for their kindness with their lives."

traits.locale_text: «Una trampa en un mundo helado... una celda cruel para víctimas vulnerables. Las almas inocentes atraídas por la señal pagaron por su amabilidad con sus vidas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「氷結惑星の罠だ…疑うことを知らぬ者にとっては無慈悲な誘惑となる。合図とともに引き込まれた純粋な魂は、優しさの代償として命を差し出す」
languages.original_text: "A trap on a frozen world — a cruel snare for unsuspecting victims. The innocent souls drawn in by the signal paid for their kindness with their lives."

traits.locale_text: 「氷結惑星の罠だ…疑うことを知らぬ者にとっては無慈悲な誘惑となる。合図とともに引き込まれた純粋な魂は、優しさの代償として命を差し出す」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eine Falle auf einer gefrorenen Welt — eine grausame Fessel für ahnungslose Opfer. Die unschuldigen Seelen, die von dem Signal angelockt wurden, haben für ihre Güte mit dem Leben bezahlt."
languages.original_text: "A trap on a frozen world — a cruel snare for unsuspecting victims. The innocent souls drawn in by the signal paid for their kindness with their lives."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Falle auf einer gefrorenen Welt — eine grausame Fessel für ahnungslose Opfer. Die unschuldigen Seelen, die von dem Signal angelockt wurden, haben für ihre Güte mit dem Leben bezahlt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "A trap on a frozen world — a cruel snare for unsuspecting victims. The innocent souls drawn in by the signal paid for their kindness with their lives."

languages.text: "Tehlikeden bihaber kurbanlara yönelik, donuk dünyaya kurulmuş, acımasız bir tuzak. Sinyale aldanan masum ruhlar, iyiliklerinin bedelini canlarıyla ödemiş."
languages.original_text: "A trap on a frozen world — a cruel snare for unsuspecting victims. The innocent souls drawn in by the signal paid for their kindness with their lives."
